Text.Page:
I was scouting the southern end of the lake and spotted some ludicrously dressed {@LinkCreature:23#11#malicious jesters} helping some {@LinkCreature:23#12#kobold mercenaries}.

This is not an alliance we can allow. Put an end to it—and them.

Fighting kobolds is one thing—fighting those jesters is another. I hate those things.

Thank you. We would have lost a lot of soldiers if you hadn't handled this.
